entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is introduced as a teacher who asks Professor McGonagall about her teaching experience. She is described as making notes and speaking in a polite tone.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as a teacher who has been teaching at Hogwarts for 39 years. She is described as brusque and coldly indifferent.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being in detention with Professor Umbridge that evening. He is also seen giving a faint smile to Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is nudged by Professor McGonall and then falls back to eavesdrop on the conversation between Professor Umbridge and Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is nudged by Ron and then falls back to eavesdrop on the conversation between Professor Umbridge and Professor McGonagall.
